TopicTitle: 2 and 3 body physics are solved. why cant this be implemented?

Articles.Content: Reading that 2 and 3 body physics are solved, and since the mass of thr spaceship is so small, why not implement local 2 or 3 body physics, negating the space ship?

I think this was already discussed to death, also it is more for the suggestions thread. The problem is only that this topic is on the what not to suggest list.

I guess this thread will be closed soon so bye.
Also... umm... game discussion is ^^^ that way. This here be the science labs.

Moved to the development discussion section, also yes this has been discussed quite thoroughly and has been ruled out by Squad, sorry.

It's on the What Not To Suggest list for that reason.
